name: British Secret Intelligence Antarctic Division
description:
British Secret Intelligence Antarctic Division

You play as Pengu, a special operative for the British Secret Intelligence Antarctic Division, sent in on a mission to aid your fellow penguins by recovering some of their missing eggs. During the mission, you will encounter ferocious seals, sharks and orcas whose only goal is to destroy the penguin race. Face them or avoid them, the choice is yours! Keep your eyes on the target and let the mission begin!

How to win:
    Collect all 4 missing eggs!

Controls:

  • Check in-game settings for default controls and customizing them!
  • Has support for controllers.
  • Toggle options for buttons.
  • Accessibility settings.

Accessibility settings:

  • Slow Motion

        Enter a slow motion mode to allow for better precision while executing actions requiring high accuracy.

  • Low Sensitivity

        Enter a low sensitivity mode to allow for better precision while executing actions requiring high accuracy

Credits:

Andrew Tkach (KennyKyle) – Programming & Level Design

Kara Fitzgerald (Kahri) – 3D Art & Animation

Robert Cazacu (taigi100) – Programming

Ian Crespo (imtiredimtired) – SFX

Sean Egan (ScooterJonesJr) – Music

Special thanks to AlfredoSauce for the cool game idea!

Engine: Unreal Engine 5

Assets:

Auto Settings by Sam Bonifacio

Hand Painted Textures Starter Kit by LowlyPoly
